thread.title: Julia Roberts 'obsessed' with husband
thread.title_full: Julia Roberts 'obsessed' with husband - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Julia Roberts 'obsessed' with husband
text:
Actress Julia Roberts says she is crazy about her husband Danny Moder even after 10 years of marriage.
READ: Julia Roberts calls husband ''safest place in the world''
While attending the Hammer Museum's 13th Annual Gala in the Garden honoring Diane Keaton in Westwood, California, on Saturday night, the 47-year-old Eat Pray Love actress said she is still head over heels for her man, reported People magazine.
When asked if there's anything she is obsessed with, Roberts pointed to Danny and said, "He's right there."
The couple stayed close throughout most of the evening and revealed how they help one another pick out what to wear.
"It's Bottega Veneta," Roberts said when asked what she was wearing. "And my husband picked it."
